casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Damon Demond STAFFORD. No. 541P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. Damon Demond Stafford, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 2nd day of November 2007 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Gaston County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th day of November 2007."

TIMMONS-GOODSON, J., recused.
